headline: Adjudicator at U.S. Department of Homeland Security

positions.description:
â¢ Serves as a contracted manpower analyst for the Army/Air National Guard in Manpower Staffing Standards Studies to establish and update workload requirements for the military to perform their Federal mission.
â¢ Worked with Subject Matter Experts (SME) in evaluating the effectiveness and efficiency of National Guard offices to determine updated staffing requirements and improved organization structures.
â¢ Identified work centers within the organizations and conducted on site operational audits to measure workload.
â¢ Researches and analyzes the current National Guard performances by conducting statistical analysis and trend interpretation.
â¢ Trained new personnel for conducting on-site operation measurement, proper communication with military personnel, and performing statistical analysis.
